children.text: We were able to discuss things that fit into three buckets. Furthering the conversation and pulling out of treadmill argumentation.

When confronted with name items I have observed that we tend to see that as the whole universe.  Whenever I see people talking past each there I stop and try and define the whole universe in which they are discussing.  
Another example of this was when discussing the idea of "not Scrum".  Scrum is a well defined Agile framework, we were going back and forth over if stuff was not scrum and I realized that when I was hearing not Scrum as was thinking not Agile, but there is lots of space that is Agile and not Scrum
